questions.question: What method was used to synthesize the luminescent and magnetic [TbEu] 2D Metal-Organic Frameworks?
What is the general formula for the synthesized lanthanoid-based 2D metal–organic frameworks?
What property of the [TbEu] 2D MOFs allows them to potentially perform as luminescent thermometers?
questions.answer: Efficient energy transfer from Tb → Eu

questions.question: True or False: The synthesized [TbEu] 2D MOFs are held together by covalent bonds.
What interaction holds the neutral nanosheets of the [TbEu] 2D MOFs together?
How were the nanosheets of the [TbEu] 2D MOFs exfoliated?
True or False: The [TbEu] 2D MOFs show no visible emission under ultraviolet light.
What is the effect of decreasing the Tb/Eu ratio on the magnetic relaxation time in [TbEu] compounds?
questions.answer: A slowing down of the relaxation time is observed

questions.question: True or False: The [TbEu] 2D MOFs can be easily exfoliated into flakes and individual nanosheets.
What potential application is suggested for the luminescent prints of Tb and Eu 2D MOFs on paper?
True or False: The luminescent properties of the [TbEu] 2D MOFs are independent of temperature.
What is the role of benzoates in the [TbEu] 2D MOFs?
questions.answer: They act as good antenna ligands for luminescence

questions.question: True or False: The [TbEu] 2D MOFs can only be synthesized in a laboratory setting.
What is the significance of the bottleneck effect observed in the [TbEu] compounds?
questions.answer: It affects the slow magnetic relaxation mechanisms

questions.question: True or False: The [TbEu] 2D MOFs are only luminescent under specific chemical conditions.
What is the observed effect of cooling from 300 K to 77 K on the luminescent properties of Tb0.9Eu0.1?
questions.answer: The intensities of Tb3+ bands increase relative to those of Eu3+

questions.question: True or False: The [TbEu] 2D MOFs exhibit slow magnetic relaxation due to quantum tunneling of magnetization.
What method was used to determine the Tb/Eu ratio in the heteronuclear samples?
True or False: The [TbEu] 2D MOFs can be used for magnetic refrigeration applications.
What is the observed effect of the Tb/Eu ratio on the total quantum yield in [TbEu] compounds?
questions.answer: The total quantum yield increases with increasing the Tb/Eu fraction
